name: OFG16k air-filled barrel
description: The barrel of the OFG16k filled with atmospheric air, resulting in suboptimal muzzle velocity but far more reliable action, plus its gas loading and sealing mechanisms and emergency release. Remove from the OFG16k, load a canister and activate to fill it with hydrogen.

use_action.msg: You prepare the canister to fill up the barrel and replace atmospheric air with pure hydrogen.

name: OFG16k hydrogen-filled barrel
description: The barrel of the OFG16k filled with pure hydrogen from an attached canister. The speed of sound is 3.8 times faster inside it, which drastically boosts muzzle velocity. Included with it are the gas loading and sealing mechanisms and emergency release. Activate to vent off all hydrogen and unseal it to the atmosphere.
//: including hydrogen canister mass because 'NO_UNLOAD' flag does the same as 'IRREMOVABLE' in a tool that also can be attached as gun mod

gunmod_data.//3: Gun mods can add ammo_effects, an interesting little feature for modding.

use_action.msg: You vent off hydrogen, expose the barrel to atmospheric air and discard the now empty canister.

//4: gunmods that consume charges and can be switched on/off after attached are not supported by the game code yet, thus this does nothing
//5: not sure how long it should last, but for now it's not important at all for the reason mentioned above.
revert_msg: The OFG16k barrel ran out of hydrogen.

name: OCG ER555 standard barrel
description: An OCG standard 5.56mm barrel. Long enough for sniper rifles as it is when used together with electrothermal-chemical technology.

name: OCG ER555 shortened barrel
description: An OCG built in shortened 5.56mm barrel, making a gun easier to carry, maneuver and aim at the expense of damage, accuracy and range. Its handguard rails support two underbarrel attachments.

name: OCG ER555 CQB barrel
description: An OCG built in very short 5.56mm barrel for close quarters battle, making a gun much easier to carry, maneuver and aim at the expense of damage, accuracy and range. Its handguard rails support two underbarrel attachments.
//: because of accuracy loss, not because the round won't travel farther and still remain lethal, as in the AKS-74U

name: OCG ER555 reinforced barrel
description: An OCG built in reinforced 5.56mm barrel for the E/QR555-SAW. Improves the gun's reliability.

name: OCG QR555 DMR barrel
description: An OCG DMR 5.56mm match-grade barrel, extending the effective range of subsonic 5.56 OCG Blackout rounds beyond 300 meters and of regular 5.56 NATO beyond 400 while maintaining the the former subsonic.
